artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō; Publisher: Sakai Shōkichi; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Komatsu Wasankichi
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和四年八月作 {Shōwa yonen hachigatsu saku} (made in August 1929)
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LL margin, publisher\'s seal: 酒井川口合版 {Sakai Kawaguchi gōban} (Sakai Kawaguchi joint publication) | LL margin: 彫工前田　摺工小松 {horikō Maeda, surikō Komatsu}  (carving by Maeda, printwork by Komatsu) | 版権所有 {hanken shoyū} (copyright)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
On back: label 初版精撰、百拾の内、第七十八號、巴水 {shohan seisen, hyaku mai no uchi, dai nanajūhachi gō, Hasui} (from 100 carefully selected prints of the first edition, no. 78, Hasui) and red round stylized artist's seal; stamp: MADE IN JAPAN.
First edition.
title: Pine Tree in Clear Weather after Snow
